fields.title: Step 1:
fields.value:
Get some of your preferred stablecoin (DAI, USDC, USDT or TUSD) and head [here](http://ipfs2.swerve.fi/#/swusd/deposit). [image](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/379253004186157068/752409604939448411/unknown.png) For #2, select your preferred settings.
Personally I trust the "Infinite Approval" and it saves time/gas in future, but it is up to user discretion.

Click "DEPOSIT" when you are ready.
Two transactions will appear, and you can submit them both at the same time.

fields.title: Step 2:
fields.value:
Go [to](http://ipfs2.swerve.fi/dao/#/) 

At the bottom of the page you should see your stablecoin tokens, which are now SWUSD [image](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/379253004186157068/752411076406149210/unknown.png). Click "DEPOSIT" to start mining.
This will require another two transactions.

Once this is complete, you should see the following [image](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/379253004186157068/752411715840507964/unknown.png). Note: you may need to refresh to see the "Claim" button.

You are now farming SWRV with your stablecoins-turned-SWUSD!

fields.title: Step 3:
fields.value: Get some of your preferred stablecoin (DAI, USDC, USDT or TUSD) and head [here](http://ipfs2.swerve.fi/#/swusd/deposit)
